title: Lalpa Chanchin tha puangtute
lyrics:
Lalpa Chanchin tha puangtute,
An thawm rimawi chu ngai teh u;
Chhandamna thu an tlangaupui,
Mi zawng zawng tana chatuan nunna thu.

Khawvel zawng hian hria sela aw,
Chatuan nun kawng Lalpa siam chu;
Tu nge lawm lo awm anga,
Kan Lalpa chu fak lo vang?

Hrehawm tinreng tuar mah sela,
Lalpaah chuan an lawm reng fo;
Lungngaih, manan, retheih karah,
Chatuan nunna thu chu an hril zel a.

An Tlantu thutiam an hre reng,
Chanchin tha puan tur thupek nen;
Tunah hrehawm rih mah sela,
Nakinah an lawm a la kim dawn si.

Remna Chanchin tha thlentute,
Aw, an ke chu a va mawi em!
An thawm chu ram tinah a thang,
An thu kawlkil
thlengin a thang chhuak ta.
